verses.roman:
sei vipra vahi' nibe vastrāmbu-bhājana
bhaṭṭācārya bhikṣā dibe kari' bhikṣāṭana

synonyms: sei vipra—the other brāhmaṇa; vahi' nibe—will carry; vastra-ambu-bhājana—the cloth and waterpot; bhaṭṭācārya—Balabhadra Bhaṭṭācārya; bhikṣā dibe—will arrange for cooking; kari'-performing; bhikṣā-aṭana—collecting alms.
translation: "The other brāhmaṇa can carry Your cloth and waterpot, and Balabhadra Bhaṭṭācārya will collect alms and cook for You."
